For the Adenian Tattoos and Female Intimates to be visible over your armor, the first thing you'll need to do is buy Transparent Armor Stone, use it and put your upper armor on it. After that, simply buy Armor Appearance Stone (R-Grade), app your shirt with one of my sexy lingerie or swimsuits and done!
Keep in mind you won't need Transparent Armor for the Unisex Swimsuits nor the Trendy Swimsuits.
